      • create

        public static java.util.Map<Deployment.Unique,java.util.List<org.rioproject.opstring.OperationalString>> create(Exertion exertion)
                                                                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Create OperationalStrings from an Exertion.
        Parameters:
        exertion - The exertion, must not be null.
        Returns:
        An Map of Deployment.Type keys withList values composed of services created from {@link ServiceSignature}s. If there are no services, return and empty {@code Map}.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the exertion is null.
        java.lang.Exception - if there are configuration issues, if the iGrid opstring cannot be loaded
